Who are we? Edgard and Helen. In 2014 we moved from Lugo di Romagna to Trentino Alto Adige for study reasons. In 2020, in full lockdown, we bought and renovated a large apartment in the beautiful Mezzocorona. And here we are now ready to open the doors of our house to the world, in the belief that the experience of a more genuine and familiar dimension will become an opportunity for cultural exchange and a source of enrichment both for us and for our guests :)

The space
Guests will have a spacious double bedroom with wardrobe and desk. Bathroom, living room and terrace are to be shared with the hosts.

Guest access
The B&B is located 20 km north of Trento and 40 km south of Bolzano. Just 5 minutes by car from the highway exit of San Michele all'Adige and 4 minutes from the railway station.
